content.en: Software Clustering Advances: Researchers have been exploring various questions related to software clustering algorithms. They have developed methods for selecting the most suitable algorithm for a specific software system, introduced novel multi-objective formulations for software module clustering, enhanced algorithms by minimizing redundant effort, and compared different approaches for software clustering. They have also investigated how cooperative clustering can improve software modularization, designed mathematical programming formulations for the software clustering problem, and proposed heuristic algorithms for optimizing software module clustering. These studies aim to improve the understanding, management, and maintenance of large software systems.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for softwareklyngedannelse: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige spørgsmål relateret til softwareklyngedannelsesalgoritmer. De har udviklet metoder til at vælge den mest passende algoritme for et specifikt softwaresystem, introduceret nye multi-objektive formuleringer for softwaremodulklyngedannelse, forbedret algoritmer ved at minimere overflødigt arbejde og sammenlignet forskellige tilgange til softwareklyngedannelse. De har også undersøgt, hvordan samarbejdende klyngedannelse kan forbedre softwaremodularisering, designet matematiske programmeringsformuleringer til softwareklyngedannelsesproblemet og foreslået heuristiske algoritmer til optimering af softwaremodulklyngedannelse. Disse studier sigter mod at forbedre forståelsen, styringen og vedligeholdelsen af store softwaresystemer.
